optimization_strategies: Preload timer animations and sound files
Use efficient React Native timer implementations
Optimize image assets for multiple screen densities
Implement proper cleanup for timer intervals

key_features: Large touch targets (minimum 44px) suitable for small fingers
High contrast colors for visual clarity
VoiceOver/TalkBack support for visually impaired children
Simple language and clear visual hierarchy
No flashing elements that could trigger seizures
Audio cues compatible with hearing aids
testing_requirements: Test with children ages 4-10 for usability
Color blindness testing with deuteranopia simulation
Motor skills testing with various finger sizes

privacy_protection: No data collection from children under 13
Parental consent flows for any data storage
Local-only operation with no external connections
content_safety: No social features or user-generated content
Safe default sound levels to protect hearing
parental_controls: Clear privacy policy in parent-friendly language

engagement_principles: Immediate visual feedback for all interactions
simplicity_requirements: Maximum 3 taps to start any timer
No complex menus or settings screens
Visual icons instead of text where possible
Forgiving interface that prevents accidental actions

code_standards: Timer state persistence across app backgrounding
Proper cleanup of audio and animation resources
testing_requirements: Unit tests for timer logic accuracy
Device testing on iOS and Android
Parent and child usability testing sessions
security_requirements: No network requests or external dependencies
Secure local storage for timer presets
App Store and Google Play compliance
